item.title: [PI] I DONT GET IT - Doors
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:426756”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529455.msg3864635#msg3864635 date=1324920586]

  1. Thank you for that lovely message.
  2. You didn’t need to make a new thread.
  case 11721:
                        if(obX == 2981 && obY == 3340) {
                                c.getPA().object(2981, 3340, 11721, -1, 0);
                        }
  1. Np
  2. Sorry :eek:
  3. Testing it. I’m sure it’ll work! It didn’t work :(.
  4. I get what I got wrong . I made 2 c.getPA()'s.

So your problem is solved? It’s working now?
[/quote]

Nope, it still doesn’t work.[/quote]

Then like I said 100 times, you’re using the wrong method.

item.title: [PI] I DONT GET IT - Doors
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I tried everything but nothing works… Can you guys tell me some faces I can use for this?

my case (in ActionHandler.java):

				case 11721:
			if(obX == 2981 && obY == 3340) {
				c.getPA().object(2981, 3340, 11721, -1, 0);
				c.getPA().object(2982, 3342, 11721, 0, 0);
			}

Read full topic
